description:
http://www.CityTV.nl
http://www.t-dose.org/

T-DOSE 2012 conference, Toshaan Bharvani, Virtualization through container.

T-DOSE 2012 Playlist:
http://www.youtube.com/playlist?list=PLBZBIkixHEieUwHjKqPMc9ckLLsMKiK4j

This presentation takes a look at virtualization, with a specific view on containers. In the first part a small overview about containers, where they differ from virtual machines and para-virtualization. A short difference between LXC and OpenVZ, the two most popular container systems. In the second part an introduction to setup containers using LXC.

27 and 28 October 2012 at the Fontys University of Applied Science in Eindhoven.
title: T-DOSE 2012, Toshaan Bharvani, Virtualization through container
